blogPost.excerpt: Product Buffs equips teams with the skills and knowledge they need to build the best possible propositions through 5 weeks of hands-on product discovery coaching.
blogPost.body: Product Buffs equips teams with the skills and knowledge they need to build the best possible propositions through 5 weeks of hands-on product discovery coaching.
blogPost.title: Product Buffs - We help teams avoid building the wrong product
blogPost.author: Craig Watson

localize.tagline: 我们帮助团队避免构建错误的产品

previous.excerpt: Shub helps businesses & professionals showcase their products & services while cross posting news to other social media channels. Post up/down vote troll limiting newsfeed & topics newsfeed. Add news images video gallery contact resume hashtags
previous.title: Shub.one - Networking platform to connect the business community

localize.description: Shub帮助企业和专业人士展示他们的产品和服务，同时将新闻交叉发布到其他社交媒体渠道。发布向上/向下投票的巨魔限制新闻源和主题新闻源。添加新闻图片视频图库联系人简历标签。
Shub幫助企業和專業人士展示他們的產品和服務，同時將新聞交叉發佈到其他社交媒體渠道。發佈向上/向下投票的巨魔限制新聞源和主題新聞源。添加新聞圖片視頻圖庫聯繫人簡歷標籤。

next.excerpt: Create charts with https://styled-components.com/. A react lib built with TS and almost no dependencies (no d3 and all this stuff). Import some default chart components as Bar, Path, BarGroup, restyle them and add back to the chart 😁-> profit.
next.title: Styled chart - Create beautiful charts with styled-components

localize.description: 用https://styled-components.com/ 创建图表。一个用TS构建的反应库，几乎没有依赖性（没有d3这些东西）。导入一些默认的图表组件为Bar、Path、BarGroup，重新设计样式并添加回图表😁->利润。
用https://styled-components.com/ 創建圖表。一個用TS構建的反應庫，幾乎沒有依賴性（沒有d3這些東西）。導入一些默認的圖表組件爲Bar、Path、BarGroup，重新設計樣式並添加回圖表😁->利潤。
